text: Dot and the Kangaroo is an Australian children’s book made by Ethel Pedley. It is the story about a 5-year-old human girl named Dot when she get lost in the Australian bushlands and she’s been meet by a Giant Female Kangaroo because it wouldn’t hurt her but it is gent. ==Related pages== * Dot and the Kangaroo, the 1977 movie. Category:1880s books Category:Children's books
title: Dot and the Kangaroo
